Room.Name: Bendine Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Bendine Way, near the Rhinestone Marina.
Room.LongDescription: The west side of the road is more or less dominated by mucky, swamp-like terrain, bordering the Rhinestone Marina. The Adlermann Center is located further to the west. On the east side of the road is the Oceancrest Homeless Soup Kitchen where out of work Oceancrest citizens can get some hot food and a cool glass of water.
